casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James Anthony BARNETT, Jr. No. 36PA16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Brendan O'Donnell, for Barnett, James Anthony (Jr.). Jennifer Harjo, Wilmington, for Barnett, James Anthony (Jr.). Iain M. Stauffer, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Craig Blitzer, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 5th of February 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

*475"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of February 2016 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
